trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_SEQ_00<tab>Conrad knows the purpose of your visit, and would like to give you a proper welcome.

TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_SEQ_01<tab>Conrad Kemp, the commander of the Ala Mhigan Resistance in Rhalgr's Reach, understands that you have important matters to discuss, and would not do so on their doorstep. He motions for you and the others to follow him deeper into the hidden sanctuary.

TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_SEQ_02<tab>The commander listens patiently as Alphinaud explains the details of the Eorzean Alliance's proposal. Together they would expel the imperial presence from Gyr Abania─or as Conrad wryly puts it, “engage them by proxy” with the vastly inferior forces of the Resistance. In any event, such weighty decisions cannot be made lightly, and the commander and his officers will need time to reach a consensus.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>It's hard to feel at ease with that giant statue looking down on you...

TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>Fascinating... A massive, nigh-imperceptible glamour encompassing the entire valley... I see now how the settlement was able to escape the watchful eyes of imperial airships.

TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_KRILE_000_010<tab>Ordinarily, I'd shudder at the thought of armed rebels trampling about in an ancient temple of immense historical importance─but Rhalgr <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the breaker of worlds, so it seems rather appropriate, if anything.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>This temple was once home to the Fist of Rhalgr, as I recall. Yes...there is no mistaking that statue.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_LYSE_000_020<tab>It's good to see Naago up and moving again. I wasn't there when she headed home, so I naturally assumed she'd left too soon. Always overdoing it, that one.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_MNAAGO_000_025<tab>A pleasure to see you again─and Krile and Y'shtola, without whose help I might not be standing here today. At least, not so soon.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_MEFFRID_000_030<tab>Ho, so you really came. I never thought I'd see you here, but I'm glad. I'm glad...
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_CONRAD_000_040<tab>Now, I know you would not have come all this way unless you had something important to discuss, and I'm eager to hear what it is you have to say...
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_CONRAD_000_041<tab>But let's not do this on our doorstep, eh? Come with me.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_MNAAGO_000_050<tab>We plan operations here─when we're not entertaining important guests like yourselves.
TEXT_STMBDA103_02448_MEFFRID_000_055<tab>When we first met back in the Shroud, I took you for just another adventurer. By Rhalgr, I still can't believe how far you've come...
